Classes in se.nicklasgavelin.bluetooth used by experimental.test
Bluetooth.EVENT
          Describes an error for the Bluetooth
BluetoothDevice
          Manages a single bluetooth device Masks the "RemoteDevice" class as extra methods are implemented to make it easier to communicate with the given device
BluetoothDiscoveryListener
          Used with the "Bluetooth" class to listen for updates regarding the device search that may be performed.
 

Classes in se.nicklasgavelin.bluetooth used by se.nicklasgavelin.bluetooth
Bluetooth
          Gives the possibility to find and connect to remote Bluetooth devices.
Bluetooth.EVENT
          Describes an error for the Bluetooth
Bluetooth.EVENT.EVENT_CODE
          The code for each of the possible events
BluetoothConnection
          This originated from the Mobile Processing project - http://mobile.processing.org Ported to Processing by extrapixel, http://www.extrapixel.ch/bluetooth/ This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
BluetoothDevice
          Manages a single bluetooth device Masks the "RemoteDevice" class as extra methods are implemented to make it easier to communicate with the given device
BluetoothDiscoveryListener
          Used with the "Bluetooth" class to listen for updates regarding the device search that may be performed.
